channel.title: Deliberate Discovery on Mark Needham
channel.description: Recent content in Deliberate Discovery on Mark Needham

item.title: Deliberate Discovery: The stuff I don't know list
item.description: Towards the end of Dan North’s post on Deliberate Discovery he makes the following suggestion: There is much more to say about deliberate discovery. Think about applying the principle to learning a new language, or picking up a new technology, or a new domain. What could you do to identify and reduce your ignorance most rapidly? This reminded me a lot of what I used to do when I came across things that I didn’t know how to do a few years ago.
